sourcesContent:
<template>
  <IonPage>
    <IonHeader>
      <IonToolbar>
        <ion-button id="open-modal" expand="block">Create New Group</ion-button>
        <IonTitle>Groups</IonTitle>
      </IonToolbar>
    </IonHeader>
    <IonContent :fullscreen="true">

      <IonList v-for="(value, name) in roomNamesAndIds" :key="name">
        <GroupItem :name="value.name" :id="value.id"></GroupItem>
      </IonList>

      <ion-modal ref="modal" trigger="open-modal" @willDismiss="onWillDismiss">
      <ion-header>
        <ion-toolbar>
          <ion-buttons slot="start">
            <ion-button @click="cancel()">Cancel</ion-button>
          </ion-buttons>
          <ion-title>Create Group</ion-title>
          <ion-buttons slot="end">
            <ion-button :strong="true" @click="cancel()">Confirm</ion-button>
          </ion-buttons>
        </ion-toolbar>
      </ion-header>
      <ion-content class="ion-padding">
        <ion-item>
          <ion-label position="stacked">Name of Group</ion-label>
          <ion-input ref="input" type="text" placeholder="Name"></ion-input>
        </ion-item>
      </ion-content>
    </ion-modal>

    </IonContent>
  </IonPage>
</template>

<script lang="js">
import { defineComponent, reactive } from 'vue';
import { IonPage, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent, IonList } from '@ionic/vue';
import { useMatrixClient } from '../stores/MatrixClient.js';
import GroupItem from "@/components/GroupItem.vue";

// TODO - Ranking functionality of group membership to curate what appears on top of the list on group profile

const client = useMatrixClient()
let roomNamesAndIds = reactive({})

setInterval(() => {
  Object.assign(roomNamesAndIds, client.getAllRoomNamesAndIds())
}, 10000)

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'GroupsPage',
  components: {GroupItem, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonContent, IonPage },
  data() {
    return {
      roomNamesAndIds: roomNamesAndIds,
    }

  },
  methods: {
      cancel() {
        this.$refs.modal.$el.dismiss(null, 'cancel');
      },
      confirm() {
        const name = this.$refs.input.$el.value;
        this.$refs.modal.$el.dismiss(name, 'confirm');
      },
    },
});
</script>
